Docs.summary: Extension methods that combine all of the static file middleware components: Default files, directory browsing, send file, and static files

Docs.summary: Enable all static file middleware (except directory browsing) for the current request path in the current directory.
Docs.remarks: Files are served from the path specified in or which defaults to the 'wwwroot' subfolder.
